page.title: 16The people of St. Agnes
page.content: The life style of the younger gener- ation varies acccording to the circum- stances that surround them. Those in full-time employment tend to be more orthodox, not being confronted with so many way-out styles. Seasonal workers usually prefer evening work, leaving their days free to go on the beach. The "Beach Boys" dream is to ride a Malibou board - and it would appear that sun, sea, surf and sand are daily necessities. Many teenagers tend to indulge in drug-taking - this is fast becoming a problem in the area. Punk dress seems to be the present trend; and with this is seen pierced ears (and noses) and multi-cloured hair. Discos are popular with young people. Two local groups, "Secret Agent" and "Poetic Injustice", have a large following at local gigs.
